thread.title: Incredible photos emerge of former president Barack Obama learning to kite surf and wrestling with pal Richard Branson during exotic getaway

author: ccharlton
title: Incredible photos emerge of former president Barack Obama learning to kite surf and wrestling with pal Richard Branson during exotic getaway
text:
Opinion OUT OF OFFICE Incredible photos emerge of former president Barack Obama learning to kite surf and wrestling with pal Richard Branson during exotic getaway 
The former US president looked without a care in the world as he enjoyed some adventure sports while staying on Necker Island By COREY CHARLTON
